member.name: IAppxBlockMapBlock.GetCompressedSize
member.summary: Retrieves compressed size of the block.
member.param: The compressed size of the block, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapBlock.GetHash
member.summary: Retrieves the hash value of the block.
member.param: The byte sequence representing the hash value of the block.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapBlock
member.summary: The IAppxBlockMapBlock interface provides a read-only object that represents an individual block within a file contained in the block map file (AppxBlockMap.xml) for the App package. The method is used to return an enumerator for traversing and retrieving the individual blocks of a file listed in the package block map.
